snippet: Chicago, who at 7-1 was off to its best start since going 12-0 in 1996-97, saw its winning streak snapped at six games.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Atlanta Hawks defeat visiting Chicago Bulls, 109-94; other NBA scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Chicago, who at 7-1 was off to its best start since going 12-0 in 1996-97, saw its winning streak snapped at six games.

headline.seo: Josh Smith’s 25 Points Help Hawks End Bulls’ Winning Streak at Six Games
headline.main: Smith Scores 25 as Hawks End Bulls’ Winning Streak
headline.print_headline: Smith Scores 25 as Hawks End Bulls’ Winning Streak
